    Ah this used to be the most played game in my school when I was in 3rd grade. Whatever ....
    Points to be noted:
    1.Same as word chain but u have to use the names of pokemon !
    2. Any pokemon name on the same page can't be repeated.
    3.thisisnot a useless thread
    4. Yes , i am not going to stop making threads......
    5. Let the game begin!
    The one who lasts till the last wins.....
    In case there are no more pokemon names from a particular letter then u may select a letter and write a pokemon name starting from that. The game shall proceed normally after that....
     
    Last edited: Feb 28, 2016
